definition: effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems/panacea/elixir
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: There is no sovereign remedy for colds.
sentences.chinese: 伤风感冒没有灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: This is a pure Chinese medicine, a true panacea against hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 本品系纯中药制品，实为治高血压之灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: With them credit expansion is the panacea for all economic ills.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为信贷扩张是所有经济弊病的灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: Yet another potential panacea lies in government funding.
sentences.chinese: 政府资助可能也是一剂灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: All these are merely the bottles carrying his mysterious elixir.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些不过是装灵丹妙药的玻璃瓶。

sentences.english: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor's book.
sentences.chinese: 开心的笑容和睡个饱觉，是最好的灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: For many years, it was presented as a panacea to environmental problems.
sentences.chinese: 很多年来，氢一直被视为解决环境问题的灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: DORAISWAMY: Unfortunately, there isn't yet a magic bullet for prevention.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸，现在还没有一种预防的灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: But teasing out the culinary panacea has been slow going.
sentences.chinese: 但取笑厨房里的灵丹妙药一直发展缓慢。

sentences.english: Sex is the solution to all of the bonobos’ problems.
sentences.chinese: 乱搞是倭黑猩猩解决一切问题的灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: To treat his auntie, he went to Xianling Island to find drug.
sentences.chinese: 为了救婶婶，李逍遥前往仙灵岛去求取灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: One of the best ways to treat a bladder infection such as cystitis is with cranberry concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 越橘浓缩物是治疗膀胱炎等疾病的一种灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: The new World Bank report on CCTs cautions that they are not a panacea for all ills.
sentences.chinese: 世行报告警告说，世上并没有灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: Some people believe that education is cure-all for social problems.
sentences.chinese: 有人以为教育是包治一切社会问题的灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: Even the best-laid plans will not be a miracle cure.
sentences.chinese: 即使是最完善的计划也不会是包治百病的灵丹妙药。

definition: legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
good medicine/panacea/fig. a good solution/a good remedy (e.g. to a social problem)
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
to rise from the dead (idiom); fig. an unexpected recovery
good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
